titleStmt.title: S. A. Atchison, Jr. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1978

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Special attention to Collections in Indiana, Kentucky, and Ohio.
Office of S. A. ATCHISON, JR.,
Attorney at Law,
COURT PLACE,
Louisville, Ky., Octbr 22nd 1864
To His Excellency Governor Bramlette.
Dear sir,

I am a practicing lawyer in this city and desire your Excellency to issue me a Commission as Notary Publlic. As I have frequent occasion to act in that capacity. I refer your Excellency to the enclosed card of G. W. Hull Esqr & the references thereon as to character, qualification &c --

I remain Very Respectfully
Yours S. A. Atchison jr

Notary Public
Jefferson Co
LS A Atchison Jr apptd 24th Oct/64
